name: No Time to Explain
flavor_text: A single word etched onto the inside of the weapon's casing: Now.

frame.name: Rewind Again
frame.description: Precision shots and shots against combatants slowed or frozen by Stasis will return to the magazine.

perks.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Fluted Barrel

perks.description:
This weapon can fire longer distances.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Accurized Rounds

perks.description: At 10 stacks of Rewind Again, a small portal will open, shooting bullets from an alternate timeline version of this weapon. Precision hits extend the portal's duration.
perks.name: Time-Slip

perks.description: Holding down the trigger will fire this weapon at full auto.
perks.name: Full Auto Trigger System
